thread.title: Sportswear-Maker Puma to Open New York Flagship on Fifth Avenue

author: Keiko Morris
title: Sportswear-Maker Puma to Open New York Flagship on Fifth Avenue
text:
German sportswear-maker Puma SE has signed a lease deal to open a flagship store on Manhattanâ€™s Fifth Avenue shopping corridor, creating a marquee location that will be the first of its kind for the company in North America.
Puma is taking a three-level, 24,000 square-foot space at 609 Fifth Ave. at 49th Street, according to SL Green Realty Corp., the real-estate investment trust that owns the building. The real-estate investment trust has launched a redevelopment that will include double-height storefronts that wrap around... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
